Location: Level 5, located near the female restrooms at Food Republic. More parenting rooms can also be found at Basement 3 and Level 1
Remarks: There are also three private breastfeeding rooms within the 313@Somerset nursing room, each furnished with an armchair, a small coffee table and two electrical points.
A rather bare nursing room
Recommended only for quick and emergency nappy changes.
Clean and well-equipped with two lockable private rooms for breastfeeding mothers
The only downside is the lack of electrical points in both rooms which will make expressing milk tough if your breast pump is not battery compatible and requires a power outlet.
There is a hot water dispenser and two high chairs for babies who have started on solids.
The Mandarin Gallery nursing room is minimal yet functional.
The Mother’s Room also contains a hot and cold water dispenser, a sink and two cushioned diaper changing stations, allowing multiple families to use the Mother’s Room simultaneously.
The OG Orchard Point Nursing Room is brightly lit and decently furnished with two padded diaper changing mats, a sink, a hot water dispenser and two large armchairs.

Location: Level 4, near restrooms and Tanuki Raw
Remarks: The Orchard Central nursing room is also lockable from the inside, offering a cosy and private place for parents to nurse and tend to their children.
The nursing room at Orchard Gateway is extremely spacious and comes equipped with a sink, bench and diaper changing station.
The Babies room at Palais Renaissance is small and furnished with the bare essentials

Location: Level 3 (near restrooms) and Level 5 (behind Lobby A, near restrooms) and inside the ladies’ restroom, next to L’Espace Beaute
Remarks: The Paragon Parents Room is decently equipped with two padded diaper changing stations, a sink and a hot water dispenser.
A no-frills nursing room, the nursing room at Scotts Square is equipped with the bare essentials
The nursing room at Robinsons (The Heeren) is a room with a lockable sliding door. The room only has a padded diaper changing table.

Tastefully decorated in shades of pastel blue and wallpaper with hot air balloons, the Takashimaya Nursing Room is extremely spacious and can easily accommodate a few families with strollers. It is divided into three areas: the waiting area, breastfeeding area and changing area.
It is well equipped with a sink, hot water dispenser and two cushioned diaper changing stations

Pristine, airy and artfully decorated with pictures of Paddington Bear, the nursing room contains two cushioned diaper changing stations with baby crib mobiles to keep your little one entertained and happy while you give him or her a quick diaper change.
The Centrepoint nursing room is quite small but equipped with the necessary facilities.

Location: Inside the female toilet at Level 3
Remarks: Suitable for quick, emergency diaper changes but if you’re looking for a good, clean and well-equipped nursing room, give this place a miss.
Preferable for quick diaper changes only.
Cheerily decorated with wallpaper of candies and various sweet treats, the space is also well-equipped with a bench, two padded diaper changing stations, a sink and an electrical point.
The nursing room in Capitol Piazza is clean, small and minimally furnished.
There are a few private breastfeeding rooms in the Funan Nursing Room, each furnished with an armchair, table and two electrical plugs per room.
Located conveniently on many levels of the building, the nursing room at National Gallery is clean and brightly lit, albeit being a little small.
The nursing room in National Museum is small and quite bare. Only recommended for emergency feeds and diaper changes.
The nursing room at Plaza Singapura is huge and decently equipped with the necessary family-friendly facilities.
The Baby Room at Raffles City is clean, spacious and well-equipped.

Location: Level 4, restrooms near the information counter
Remarks: The One Raffles Place nursing room is clean and well-equipped with a sink, hot and cold-water dispenser as well as a diaper changing station.
There is no diaper changing station in the nursing room – these can be found in the separate parenting room.
The family room is spacious and clean. It is equipped with a sink, hot and cold-water dispenser as well as two diaper changing stations.

Address: 45 Maxwell Road, The URA Centre, Singapore 069118
Remarks: It has two lockable nursing rooms with sofas and changing tables.
A cosy, private haven for nursing mothers to express or breastfeed, albeit being a little small.
The Marina Square nursing room or family room is decently equipped.
Located at the basement, the Millenia Walk nursing room is brightly-lit, clean and fairly well equipped with the necessary baby care facilities.

Location: West Wing, Level 1 (near Adidas, near restrooms)
Remarks: One of the most well-equipped nursing rooms

Mall: The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands
Remarks: Spacious, clean and warmly-lit, The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands nursing room is a cosy haven for parents to attend to their young children.
